com.googlecode.aluminumproject.resources
Class ClassPathTemplateFinder

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.resources.AbstractTemplateFinder
      com.googlecode.aluminumproject.resources.ClassPathTemplateFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationElement, TemplateFinder
public class ClassPathTemplateFinder
extends AbstractTemplateFinder

Looks for templates in the class path.

By default, templates will be looked for in the root of the class path, but this template path can be configured using the "template_finder.class_path.template_path" parameter. A template path is separated by slashes, but does not start with a slash.

          The name of the configuration parameter that contains the path in which templates will be looked for.
